text: 24.30: Dan 7.13; Sek 12.10-14; Mk 13.26; VB 1.7; 6.12-13Mba tugen Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guar, kha nuianan zirɨrga ana bun nzuai bigeŋ kha buivar hɨgɨrga, kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi sɨmɨv nzirga. Mbe nziv ganɨnga, Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guar, ana Hevenan kegɨp buiva hura phorgɨp won ŋkasŋka bakɨm gum vhava ŋaara bakɨme phorgɨp zirɨrga.
